TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LabelExpression extends System.Linq.Expressions.Expression

Docs.summary: Represents a label, which can be put in any <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> context. If it is jumped to, it will get the value provided by the corresponding <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression>. Otherwise, it receives the value in <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelExpression.DefaultValue%2A>. If the <xref:System.Type> equals System.Void, no value should be provided.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression Accept(class System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor visitor) cil managed

Docs.summary: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelExpression"> when the label is reached through regular control flow (for example, is not jumped to).
Docs.value: The Expression object representing the value of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelExpression">.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType NodeType { get; }

Docs.summary: Returns the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression">.
The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget"> which this label is associated with.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget"> which this label is associated with.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed Type Type { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> represents.
Docs.value: The Type that represents the static type of the expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Linq.Expressions.LabelExpression Update (System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget target, System.Linq.Expressions.Expression defaultValue);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Linq.Expressions.LabelExpression Update(class System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget target, class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression defaultValue) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children. If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
Docs.returns: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
